class.name: WhisperSegment
class.brief_description: Represents a single transcribed segment of audio.
class.description: A data object that contains the transcription results for a specific time segment of the audio. It includes the transcribed text, the start and end timestamps, and additional metadata such as the probability of no speech being present in the segment. These are generated by [WhisperFull] and [WhisperMicrophoneTranscriber].

members.member: The probability (from 0.0 to 1.0) that this segment does not contain any speech. Higher values indicate silence, background noise, or non-speech audio.
If [code]true[/code], indicates that the next segment is likely spoken by a different speaker (diarization suggestion).
The start time of the segment, measured in milliseconds from the beginning of the audio.
The end time of the segment, measured in milliseconds from the beginning of the audio.
The transcribed text content for this audio segment.
